devdoc.author: Pengyang Zhou
devdoc.title: Events definition for charity funding with ether donations

LogDonationMade(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new donation is made to a project

LogExpenseAllocated(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when an expense reached to an approved state and allocation will be transferred

LogExpenseAllocationFailure(uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when an expense reached to an approved state and but allocation transfer is failed

LogExpenseApproved(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Emitted when an expense is approved from a donator

LogRefund(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a refund is made to a donator

LogRefundFailure(uint256,address,uint256.notice: Emitted when a refund to a donator is failed
